summary: A training script that prepares the MS MARCO dataset, configures a SentenceTransformer bi-encoder, and optimizes it using a margin‑based mean‑squared‑error loss. It manages data loading, model initialization, training loops, evaluation, and checkpointing to produce a dense retrieval model.
business_intent: To develop and fine‑tune a high‑performance dense retrieval model for question‑answering or search applications, enhancing relevance ranking on large‑scale text corpora such as MS MARCO.
